entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as the one who left a will for Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who received Dumbledore's will.

entities.name: scrimgeour

entities.description: The Deluminator is an object given by Scrimgeour.

entities.name: tales of beedle the bard
entities.description: The Tales of Beedle the Bard is a book given by Scrimgeour.

entities.name: snitch
entities.description: An old Snitch was left to Harry by Dumbledore.

entities.name: ron

entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as one of the people present.

entities.name: mr. weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is asked a question by Harry.

relationships.description: Dumbledore left his will to Harry.
Scrimgeour gave the Deluminator to Harry.
Scrimgeour gave The Tales of Beedle the Bard to Harry.
Dumbledore left an old Snitch to Harry.
